description: This Python script sets up an AI research agent using the 'agno' framework, integrating search capabilities with academic writing features to generate structured research reports. It includes class instantiations, configuration of tools, and example usage for generating research summaries.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents the AI agent configured with models, tools, and instructions for research report generation.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model wrapper for OpenAI's chat models, used as the core language model for the agent.

classes.name: ExaTools
classes.description: Provides search capabilities using Exa.ai, integrated as a tool for the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class to generate and output a research report based on a prompt.
